name: R5-ContactPointSystem-R4-ContactPointSystem
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ContactPointSystem into a FHIR R4 ContactPointSystem

element.display: The value is an email address.

target.display: The value is an email address.

element.display: The value is a fax machine. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.

target.display: The value is a fax machine. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.

element.display: A contact that is not a phone, fax, page or email address and is not expressible as a URL.  E.g. Internal mail address.  This SHOULD NOT be used for contacts that are expressible as a URL (e.g. Skype, Twitter, Facebook, etc.)  Extensions may be used to distinguish "other" contact types.

target.display: A contact that is not a phone, fax, page or email address and is not expressible as a URL.  E.g. Internal mail address.  This SHOULD NOT be used for contacts that are expressible as a URL (e.g. Skype, Twitter, Facebook, etc.)  Extensions may be used to distinguish "other" contact types.

element.display: The value is a pager number. These may be local pager numbers that are only usable on a particular pager system.

target.display: The value is a pager number. These may be local pager numbers that are only usable on a particular pager system.

element.display: The value is a telephone number used for voice calls. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.

target.display: The value is a telephone number used for voice calls. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.

element.display: A contact that can be used for sending a sms message (e.g. mobile phones, some landlines).

target.display: A contact that can be used for sending an sms message (e.g. mobile phones, some landlines).

element.display: A contact that is not a phone, fax, pager or email address and is expressed as a URL.  This is intended for various institutional or personal contacts including web sites, blogs, Skype, Twitter, Facebook, etc. Do not use for email addresses.

target.display: A contact that is not a phone, fax, pager or email address and is expressed as a URL.  This is intended for various institutional or personal contacts including web sites, blogs, Skype, Twitter, Facebook, etc. Do not use for email addresses.
